content.rendered: With over 30 years’ experience, our Buying Team can manage up to 2,000 product lines at any given time. Together with the Sales Team, they’re hunting down the market intelligence which will put your brand and business in front of the right customers at the right time. With their network of powerful industry contacts and supplier relationships, they get ‘first refusal’ on key branded products – keeping you ahead of the competition.
